attributes.contentHtml:
I can vouch for ArtiomsHosting in this thread since I was the first one to bring to his attention to make a privacy policy because he would get a thread, we were on voice and he was like "Damn who deleted my Privacy Policy?" And I knew he was lying, since his #legal channel stood still too long.

I can say that He then copied ArtiomsHosting Privacy Policy with ownership of Artiom and the author Dibster, this is considered an Intellectual Property theft or Copyright Infringement.

LuxxyHosting is not a good company at all, the owner is stealing someone’s work to profit of it and doesn’t give any credits.

attributes.title: Luxxy hosting ( free hosting ) - luxxy stealer
